title: 1 dead in crash involving trucks, car on N.J. highway
body: One person was killed Tuesday in a multi-vehicle crash on Route 295 in , a  spokesman said.The wreck - which involved a tractor trailer, a dump truck and a car - occurred shortly before 3 p.m. on the highway’s southbound side in Deptford Township, according to Sgt. First Class Lawrence Peele, of the State Police.More details on the crash were not immediately released. Police were at the scene as of around 4:30 p.m.All southbound lanes remained closed at Exit 21, according to the state Department of Transportation.Update: I-295 southbound, all lanes closed and detoured at Exit 21 - CR 640/Delaware St., West Deptford due to crash. Follow detour or plan alternate route and expect  delays of 20 - 25 minutes.     Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
